languages.text: Смертельно опасный патоген парализовал жизнь колонии. Чернь в ужасе, планетарные власти — в смятении.

traits.locale_text: Смертельно опасный патоген парализовал жизнь колонии. Чтобы сдержать болезнь, губернатор обьявил карнтин и приказал сжигать больных без жалости.

languages.text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.
languages.original_text: Смертельно опасный патоген парализовал жизнь колонии. Чернь в ужасе, планетарные власти — в смятении.

traits.locale_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.
A deadly pathogen has paralyzed life in the colony. To contain it, the governor has enacted strict quarantine rules and ordered to burn the sick.
A deadly pathogen has paralyzed life in the colony. To contain it, the governor has enacted strict quarantine rules and has ordered to burn the sick.
A deadly pathogen has paralyzed life in the colony. To contain it, the governor has enacted strict quarantine rules and has ordered to burn the sick.

A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.
A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.

languages.text: 殖民地中爆发了致命的病原体。普通民众被吓坏了，行星当局也不知所措。
languages.original_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.

traits.locale_text: 殖民地中爆发了致命的病原体。普通民众被吓坏了，行星当局也不知所措。

languages.text: Un patógeno letal ha paralizado la colonia. El populacho está aterrado y las autoridades planetarias no saben reaccionar.
languages.original_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.

traits.locale_text: Un patógeno letal ha paralizado la colonia. El populacho está aterrado y las autoridades planetarias no saben reaccionar.

languages.text: 致死性の病原体がコロニーを麻痺させ、大衆は恐怖に怯え、惑星当局は途方に暮れている。
languages.original_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.

traits.locale_text: 致死性の病原体がコロニーを麻痺させ、大衆は恐怖に怯え、惑星当局は途方に暮れている。

languages.text: Ein tödliches Pathogen hat die Kolonie gelähmt. Der Pöbel ist völlig verängstigt, die planetaren Behörden völlig überfordert.
languages.original_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.

traits.locale_text: Ein tödliches Pathogen hat die Kolonie gelähmt. Der Pöbel ist völlig verängstigt, die planetaren Behörden völlig überfordert.

languages.text: Un pathogène mortel a paralysé la colonie. La population est terrifiée, les autorités planétaires sont perplexes.
languages.original_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.

traits.locale_text: Un pathogène mortel a paralysé la colonie. La population est terrifiée, les autorités planétaires sont perplexes.

languages.text: Koloni, ölümcül bir hastalığa teslim olmuş hâlde. Ayaktakımı korku içindeyken gezegendeki yetkililer şaşkın.
languages.original_text: A deadly pathogen has paralysed the colony. The rabble is terrified, the planetary authorities are flummoxed.
